page.title: 17The Armed Forces. cont
page.content: self loading rifle.They wear steel toe capped boots and also carry a radio and a walkie-talkie and keep in touch with the police station.This is not much protection against the terrorists who use mortar bombs,petrol bombs and booby trapped car bombs.All police barracks and army depots in Northern Ireland are supposed to be heavily guarded as they are targets for the terrorists but in Newry a few months ago nine people were killed when their canteen was blown to pieces by a mortar bomb.
